episode_event_general_ch0130_10_serena/6: Hey there! Thanks for showing up!

The reason why I called you here is because I
need your help searching for something!

Take a look at this strange specimen that was
delivered to the Pokémon Center.

Doesn’t it look a bit like a cell? I’m thinking it
might be part of a Pokémon.
Oh, it’s green and sparkly. And also a bit squishy!

Fascinating, right? I think we should do more
investigating to figure out what it is!

This may have something to do with the rumor
that Hoopa has brought Pokémon to Pasio.

We’re on it! Let’s split up and look for more
of them!

This hunt is gonna have us searching all
over Pasio!

Keep your eyes peeled so you don’t miss any
green sparkles!
